about.summary: Activate dark mode on your favorite 'ggplot2' theme with dark_mode() or use the dark versions of 'ggplot2' themes, including dark_theme_gray(), dark_theme_minimal(), and others. When a dark theme is applied, all geom color and geom fill defaults are changed to make them visible against a dark background. To restore the defaults to their original values, use invert_geom_defaults().

Activate dark mode on your favorite 'ggplot2' theme with dark_mode() or use the dark versions of 'ggplot2' themes, including dark_theme_gray(), dark_theme_minimal(), and others. When a dark theme is applied, all geom color and geom fill defaults are changed to make them visible against a dark background. To restore the defaults to their original values, use invert_geom_defaults().

name: r-ggdark
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggdark
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggdark_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggdark/ggdark_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2ebf9d1d9a3d5dc3b0546e04756340aafd4e51883fed40904ebd9047a47823f1

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggdark')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggdark')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ggdark
  license: MIT
  summary: Activate dark mode on your favorite 'ggplot2' theme with dark_mode() or use the dark
    versions of 'ggplot2' themes, including dark_theme_gray(), dark_theme_minimal(),
    and others. When a dark theme is applied, all geom color and geom fill defaults
    are changed to make them visible against a dark background. To restore the defaults
    to their original values, use invert_geom_defaults().
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - winni2k

# Package: ggdark
# Type: Package
# Title: Dark Mode for 'ggplot2' Themes
# Version: 0.2.1
# Author: Neal Grantham
# Maintainer: Neal Grantham <neal@nsgrantham.com>
# Description: Activate dark mode on your favorite 'ggplot2' theme with dark_mode() or use the dark versions of 'ggplot2' themes, including dark_theme_gray(), dark_theme_minimal(), and others. When a dark theme is applied, all geom color and geom fill defaults are changed to make them visible against a dark background. To restore the defaults to their original values, use invert_geom_defaults().
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Depends: R (>= 3.1)
# Imports: ggplot2 (>= 3.0)
# Suggests: testthat
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-01-09 08:17:48 UTC; neal
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-11 17:30:06 UTC
